page.content:
We also made a survey of travel to these leisure pursuits for pupils. {Bus Bike Walk Car Train 1 Ridgeway 29% 6% 40% 24% 1% 2 St. Jos. 17% 7% 30% 46% 0% 3 Our Lady 34% 6% 21% 3% 36% 4 Manor 22% 4% 66% 8% 0% {26% 6% 39% 20% 9%
No real differences for secondary pupils (Ridgeway) and junior pupils But large differences using private & public transport. Note use of cars for schools 2,3,4, and use of train & bus by school 3. It reflects poorer income areas for schools 3&4 (fewer cars) but also shows public transport provision between areas of city. Where trains or buses are plentiful they are well used by children to get to leisure pursuits Planners note! (Compare Amenity survey -bus services sqs. 3&4 with sq. 10.
